subsection_analysis.refined_text: Here’s an overview: This trip plan involves four days exploring Nice and its surroundings!  A key attraction would be the Promenade des Anglais – perfect for strolling along the coast and visiting the Matisse Museum which showcases Henri Matisse’s art and history as well as other works by the artist as well as other art forms.

Here’s an overview: This guide provides an extensive look into four major cities within the South France region – Nice, Cannes, Avignon, and Montpellier – highlighting their history and unique cultural experiences. It’s perfect for planning an unforgettable trip with your group of college friends!

Here’s an overview:

Nîmes offers an incredible historical journey with its Roman arena and temple of Diana – two significant sites showcasing Nimes’s rich past as an important Roman settlement during the Roman Empire’s reign. This trip would be perfect for exploring Nimes’s fascinating history and allowing your group time to appreciate its architectural wonders.

Here’s an overview:

A four-day trip plan focusing on Arles and its rich history should include visits to the Roman Amphitheatre – an impressive structure with artistic significance – alongside Vincent van Gogh’s time there and his profound influence on his art and paintings which were inspired by Arles’s location as an important Roman settlement and pilgrimage center.

Here’s an overview: This trip plan involves four days exploring the historic city of Perpignan which blends French and Catalan cultures with an impressive fortress and cathedral that was built over centuries ago.
